Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 37th overall pick, by Seattle in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Alphonso Anguita (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/19/2015, off Steven Lawrence (SLB)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2015, hitting .480 with 0 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/2016, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2016...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
9/26/2018: Signed a contract extension with Seattle, $11,000,000 per year, for 5 years.
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2019...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against New York on 6/3/2020...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2020...
Injured on 8/11/2021 with a Broken Nose, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/2021, hitting .455 with 3 HR, 4 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 6/22/2022...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/2022, hitting .545 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2022, hitting .611 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2023...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/13/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2024...
